posts.post_content:
This is the last T206 I have left.  This is the Frank Smith Boston and Chicago error with a Polar Bear back.  Asking $200 OBO.  Presents beautifully.  Only an A because of the bottom right corner.  


[URL=http://s1243.photobucket.com/user/southernsportscards/media/SPORTS/Vintage/20160424_00001_001_zpsd2hcvptk.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1243.photobucket.com/albums/gg541/southernsportscards/SPORTS/Vintage/20160424_00001_001_zpsd2hcvptk.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

David
